title: Stress-Based Language Learning Competency Enhancement Program for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Language learning integrated with managerial/leadership roles via smartphone-based LMS.

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more strategies for recognizing and managing optimal levels of stress through challenging language tasks
Learners can apply effective communication techniques in stress-inducing simulation scenarios to resolve work-related problems
Learners can establish self-directed language learning plans based on peer feedback and evaluate their feasibility

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
